channel.title: Getting chairs to work?
channel.description: I would like to get some working chairs so people can sit on them at home, but I have no idea how to do this and google isnt helping either, if you know how to make it so people can sit in chairs please help! Thanks

item.title: Getting chairs to work?

13586 - Chair - A comfortable seat.
13587 - Chair - A comfortable seat.

Maybe those?[/quote]

item.title: Getting chairs to work?
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

You could always use a chair that has the option to sit on it already. Look at the ones you can build from the construction skill.

All you’d need to do is at the animation and any extra things.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting chairs to work?

item.description:

item.title: Getting chairs to work?
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Hulsif, post:9, topic:509207”]Okay, can you explain how this works? The chairs that I want sittable are already there but they arent actual objects they are like a wall for a building, can I make these sittable or do I have to actually add an object Id with the animation? I probably sound dumb just saying that but I don’t have alot of experience with animations etc. Thanks

Wait the chairs that I want to be able to be sittable can be examined, so would those work?[/quote]is that the only option it has?

Read full topic
